text: Kleindietwil was a municipality in the administrative district of Oberaargau in the canton of Bern in Switzerland. On 1 January 2011, Kleindietwil and Leimiswil were merged with the municipality of Madiswil.Nomenklaturen â€“ Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz accessed 4 April 2011 ==Gallery== File:2012-03-01-Supra Argovio (Foto Dietrich Michael Weidmann) 382.JPG|Kleindietwil File:2012-03-01-Supra Argovio (Foto Dietrich Michael Weidmann) 372.JPG|Kleindietwil train station == References == ==Other websites== Category:Former municipalities in Oberaargau
